hero.title: SEITWERK
hero.description: We combine creative ideas with technical excellence to create digital solutions for our clients.

projects.headline: We are experts in
projects.intro: Since 2004, Seitwerk has been an owner-managed company offering the entire spectrum of new media under one roof. Our specialists deliver everything from concept to design to implementation. We consult, analyze, design, program, create animations, and produce audio and video sequences in our own studio—and much more.
projects.subheadline: Here are a few of our favorite projects

items.title: Our new collaboration with FIS
items.description: FIS - International Ski and Snowboard Federation

items.title: Digital playmakers: Our app for the cup winner
Fresh shine for the Pierre Boulez Hall
Homepage of TDK Electronics shines with new design
items.description: With automotive partners into the future

kunden.headline: Our Clients
kunden.intro: Since 2004, various companies have benefited from our services: Our clients include some of the largest companies and organizations worldwide. At the same time, we remain open to small and medium-sized enterprises and support communities, clubs, and businesses from our region.

footer.description: Since 2004, Seitwerk, as an owner-managed company, has offered the full spectrum of new media under one roof. Our specialists deliver everything from concept to design to implementation from a single source. We advise, analyze, design, program, create animations, produce audio and video sequences in our own studio, and much more.
